main.title: Microservices Architecture made easy!
main.content1: Frontend, Auth/Authz, GraphQL, etc. - All Patterns supported by modeling
main.content2: Event driven microservices with Kafka, Spring, Axon, Eventuate
main.title2: Don’t worry about the implementation. Just focus on your ideas.
main.content4: Now, leave your business analysis and system design to Chat GPT-based AI service.
main.content5: Create Business Model Canvas, Customer Journey Map, Eventstorming Model and User Story automatically.
main.content7: and get straight into implementation with the source codes created by template and AI

tools.eventstorming-inst: Event Storming is a workshop for MSA DDD that is conducted with Sticky Notes.
tools.kubernetes-inst: Kubernetes is an open-source system for automating deployment, scaling, and management of containerized applications.
tools.bmc-inst: The Business Model Canvas is a strategic management template used for developing new business models and documenting existing ones.
tools.bpmn-inst: Business Process Model and Notation (BPMN) is a graphical representation for specifying business processes in a business process model.

tutorials.axon-inst: A saga patterned eventstorming model for microservice application based on Axon Framework
tutorials.ddd-inst: Eventstorming example based on Google Drive scenario
tutorials.unit-inst: Gradual implementation by running Cloud IDE-based unit microservices & mutual test
tutorials.reqres-inst: Applying synchronous calls between monoliths and microservices, or between microservices
tutorials.cb-inst: Fail-Fast strategy pattern to block failure propagation in advance in synchronous communication between services
tutorials.pubsub-inst: Applying EDA-based message communication with non-blocking & fault isolation
tutorials.comcor-inst: Managing consistency by compensation handling when transaction fails in MSA environment
tutorials.jwt-inst: Applying Single-Sign-On pattern for authentication & authorization of microservices
tutorials.hateoas-inst: Implementing HATEOAS API to deliver a link for state transition & Frontend based on it
tutorials.graphql-inst: Creating GraphQL-based backend application for data composition
